basics.name: Professional Profile
basics.label: Director of Programming Arts
basics.summary: Tech-savvy Performing Arts Director well-versed in all aspects of event management from inception to completion. Excels in marketing and talent programming, as well as process rethinking and improvement.

work.name: DSU
work.summary: Managed all aspects of multiple cultural arts activities at several venues. Oversaw improvement strategies for several shows and venues. Successfully increased ticket sales and created a scholarship program for DSU students.
highlights: Increased 30% in season ticket memberships to the Celebrity Concert Series in only one year
Successfully managed CCS and Tanner Amphitheater
Revamped Tanner Amphitheater by adding visual design elements and improved programming

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Had significant involvement in planning and implementing multiple concert series each year in St George, Utah.

work.name: Spiral Studios
work.summary: Managed a commercial recording studio, created production music and managed festival-style shows and staff.
highlights: Established many industry relationships with both entertainers and management

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Experience as a performing musician provides a unique understanding of the industry from multiple perspectives.
